createClaimableAirdrop(address,address,u.details: Launch a new instance of the CoinGenieAirdropClaimable Contract.

params.airdropAmount: The amount of tokens available for airdrop
params.airdropTokenAddress: The address of the airdrop token
params.expirationTimestamp: The expiration timestamp of the airdrop
params.maxWalletClaimCount: The maximum number of tokens that can be claimed by a wallet if not in the whitelist
params.merkleRoot: The merkle root of the whitelist
params.tokenOwner: The address of the token owner

returns.newAirdrop: The address of the newly deployed airdrop contract

userdoc.notice: A factory library to deploy instances of the AirdropERC20Claimable contract.
